texts.text: Featured servers/Pixel Paradise
Pixel Paradise is a Minecraft Featured Server on Bedrock Edition platform. It is owned by the creators of Mineville aka Mobcrush/InPvP LLC. The server averages under 1000 players.
Contents

1 Criticism
2 Games
2.1 Islands
2.2 Volcano
2.3 Spleef
2.4 TNT Run
2.5 Guess Who
2.6 Cookcraft
Criticism

The server has received criticism for making some games Pay-To-Play. The games in specific are Islands and Volcano. Many have said that its intention is to pry money away from unsuspecting younger players. It is currently the least popular featured server.
Another common criticism is that the server does not have a party system which can make it difficult to play with friends.
Another one of the criticisms is a rusty chat filter. The filter doesn't work like from other servers that anyone can say cuss words (eg: f**k, s*it, etc.)
Games
Islands
The game is similar to Skyblock, where you are on a survival island in the ocean instead of in the sky.
Volcano
The game is very similar to the Prison gamemode, but with a volcano theme.
Spleef
In the game you have to dig the blocks from underneath the player's feet to make them fall to their death.
TNT Run
A classic from Mineville! TNT will fall as players run across the TNT path; if they fall in the void they are out.
Guess Who
A classic from Hide 'n' Seek. The player needs to hide from the seekers, by looking at the closest ones. If a seekers finds a hider they'll be eliminated.
Cookcraft
In this gamemode one has to complete objectives such as serving customers aswell as cooking. It is a classic restuarant tycoon.
